> **TLDR**: Police caught the main guy in the Tamhini Ghat murder case. About damn time they did. 

The Navi Mumbai police finally caught a break in the Tamhini Ghat murder case, nabbing a key suspect. After weeks of what felt like a dead end, investigators got their guy. 

The accused was picked up near Panvel early this morning. Details are still trickling in, but sources within the Kharghar police station confirm it's a major development. The suspect is currently being questioned; officials hope to uncover the full story behind the brutal crime that shocked the area near Sector 35.

Remember that horrific discovery? The one that made national headlines? Well, Kharghar police seems to be finally closing this case. Now it's time to see if justice will truly be served.
